text: The Unknown Soldier (, ) is a 1955 Finnish World War II movie directed by Edvin Laine and was based on the 1954 novel of the same name by Väinö Linna. It stars Kosti Klemelä, Heikki Savolainen, Reino Tolvanen, Veikko Sinisalo, Pentti Siimes, Leo Riuttu, Jussi Jurkka and Åke Lindman. ==Other websites== * * Category:1955 war movies Category:Finnish movies Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Edvin Laine Category:Movies set in Finland Category:Movies set in Russia
title: The Unknown Soldier (1955 movie)
